thread.title: Paul Perini III
thread.title_full: Vacuum-Direct.com reviewed by Paul Perini III

author: Paul Perini III
title: Paul Perini III
text:
Vacuum-Direct was able to get me the individual part I needed. They didn't force me to purchase the entire assembly containing the part I needed.
The only reason it is not a 5 star is that the shipping was pretty much a flat amount regardless of the piece purchased. The part i needed was less than $2 but ended up costing me $11 or so with the shipping. In the end, still not a bad deal since other sites weren't even allowing me to get the individual part (>$100 for the entire assembly on some sites), but it would have been nice for the $2 part to have lower shipping.
I'd still recommend Vacuum-Direct to anyone in need of quality vacuum parts.
